TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckedListBox/CheckedIndexCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type CheckedListBox.CheckedIndexCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 封装 中选中的项（包括处于不确定状态的项）的索引集合。

span.span: Encapsulates the collection of indexes of checked items (including items in an indeterminate state) in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Checked 索引集合是 控件中所有项的集合中的索引的子集。The checked indexes collection is a subset of the indexes into the collection of all items in the control. 这些索引指定处于选中状态或不确定状态的项。These indexes specify items in a checked or indeterminate state. 下表是控件中的项（包含在控件中的所有项）的索引集合的示例。The following table is an example of the indexed collection of items in the control (all items contained in the control). |IndexIndex|项Item|检查状态Check State| |-----------|----------|-----------------| |00|对象1object 1|| |11|对象2object 2|| |22|对象3object 3|| |33|对象4object 4|| |44|对象5object 5|| 根据前面的示例，下表显示已选中项的索引索引集合。Based on the previous example, the following table shows the indexed collection of indexes of checked items. |IndexIndex|项的索引Index of Item| |-----------|-------------------| |00|11| |11|33| |22|44| 类有两个成员，可用于访问存储的索引、 属性和 方法。The class has two members that allow you to access the stored indexes, the property and the method. 根据前面的示例，对参数值为1的 属性的调用将返回值3。Based on the previous example, a call to the property with a parameter value of 1 returns a value of 3. 使用参数3对 的调用将返回值1。A call to with a parameter of 3 returns a value of 1. ## Examples 下面的示例将枚举 中选中的项，以查看项所在的复选状态。The following example enumerates the checked items in the to see what check state an item is in. 该示例演示如何使用 方法设置项的复选状态。The example demonstrates using the method to set the check state of an item. 该示例还演示了如何使用 属性获取 ，并演示如何使用 属性来获取 。The example also demonstrates using the property to get the , and the property to get the . 第一个循环使用 方法获取每个选中项的 （给定项的索引）。The first loop uses the method to get the of each checked item, given the index of the item. 第二个循环也使用 ，但使用 方法检索项的索引。The second loop also uses , but uses the method to retrieve the index for the item. remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 参数是 items 集合中选中项的索引。The `index` parameter is the index of a checked item in the items collection. 返回值是已选中索引集合中的对应索引。The return value is the corresponding index into the checked indexes collection.
